content: this pattern was adapted from one of our shop patterns for our april makers league project 1 a slow increase and simple slipped stitches at the end of each row make a beautiful easy shape with smooth edge detail we used every bit of yarn to make this scarf 80 long we love how this yarn works up in garter stitch click here to get the kit 2 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/makers-league htm 2 http //www darnknitanyway com/shop/makers-league/april/p/easy-does-it-x39268116 htm
